properties.Name of Sp: Samagipura Middle of Village (Start place of Diyagala)
properties.Observed p: The starting point of the stream. From that place, water flows like stream.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceVegetative cov

properties.Observed p: A reserve area of about 1.0 acre. Currently being cleared by human for cultivation.

properties.Observed p: Located in Samagipura reserve. A concrete wall is built to collect spring water and then send it to a water storage tank for distribution. About 60 families use water. The water treatment plant is not functioning and needs to be renovated.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceVegetative cov

properties.Observed p: An area of water lodging where several springs are located. People taken water informally using pipes.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceVegetative cov

properties.Observed p: Located in Samagipura reserve. Spring water flowing along a canal and taken water using PVC pipes. About 40 families use water. Spring should be preserved. A new water storage tank should be built.

properties.Observed p: Located in St. Leonard's Estate.  Spring water flowing along a canal and Water is drawn into the storage tank using 50mm ï¿½ PVC pipes. Bathing place has also been built using spring water. About 35 families use water. Spring should be preserved.

properties.Observed p: Located in St. Leonard's Estate. Spring water is collected in a concrete pond that has been constructed.  Water is obtained for school use. A security fence has been built around the spring. Spring should be preserved.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceVegetative cov

properties.Observed p: The spring is being preserved and a tank is being built to distribute water. But there are about 25 houses near the spring where people live. Wastewater is being added to spring water through household toilets.
properties.Descriptio: Water Quality Testing needs to be done
